txt.en: 'In the western parts of Pren Gwydh, you will find a huge den of the even meaner, nastier kin of the Bloodtusk lurking in great numbers. These are the elders of the common boars, and they are even worse than their younger cousins.\n\n'If you wish to prove that you are a worthy hunter of game, you should go cull some of those hardy boars next.'
'You have done well for an outsider. But I am not yet impressed....'
'You are still here, are you? What sort of hunter do you think you are, standing around in villages while your prey roams free?'
The hardier, elder generation of the Bloodtusk family can be found in Bloodtusk's Dwelling in Pren Gwydh.
Defeat hardy forest-boars in Bloodtusk's Dwelling ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The hardy forest-boars of the Bloodtusk family can be found in Bloodtusk's Dwelling, north and west of Galtrev.\n\nYou should prove your worth as a master of the hunt by defeating many of the greater boars in Pren Gwydh on their own turf.
Louri is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should return to Louri now that you have killed many of the vicious boars on their own turf.
